attacks.name: Burrow
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done by attacks to Dugtrio during your opponent's next turn. (any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Dig Under
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. Don't apply Weakness or Resistance. (any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)
